messages.text: I promoted a few packages to `v1` (`MortalityTables`, `LifeContingencies`, and `ActuaryUtilities` recently).

messages.text: I also created a <https://www.linkedin.com/company/juliaactuary|LinkedIn page>, where I’ll post periodic updates and try and reach actuaries in a more common habitat (LinkedIn) vs Github.

messages.text: The first post highlights a new ActuaryUtilities feature, which is easy copy/paste to/from Excel into a Julia session.
